qas.question: How long is a typical uncoiled tungsten filament for a 60-watt bulb?
What is the advantage of a coiled-coil filament over a straight filament?

answers.text: The coiled-coil filament evaporates more slowly

qas.question: What positive effects does a slower-evaporating filament enable?
What is the typical diameter of the filament on a 60-watt bulb?

plausible_answers.text: the filament usually consists of multiple coils of coiled fine wire

qas.question: What did not improve efficiency of the lamp?
How long is a typical uncoiled tungsten filament for a 40-watt bulb?

plausible_answers.text: The coiled-coil filament evaporates more slowly

qas.question: What are the disadvantage of the coiled coil vs a straight filament?
What negative effects does a slower evaporating filament cause?
